1 Thess 5:23a - FLN
pick3: Now may the God of peace himself sanctify you completely and may your whole
1 Thess 5:23b - PFL
pick3: spirit and soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ
esv: Now may the God of peace himself sanctify you completely and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ
column6:
How can we be kept holy "at" his coming?  Shouldn't "at" be changed to "until"? Maybe he's saying that at that day, we hope that the whole spirit and soul and body "has been" kept holy.
What does it mean to be "completely" sanctified?
